verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* the \w undefiled|strong="H8549"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, who \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 119.1 \ft undefiled: or, perfect, or, sincere\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* they that \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* his \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*, \add and that\add* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him with the whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
They also \w do|strong="H6466"\w* no \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*: they \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.
Thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add us\add* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3966"\w*.
O \w that|strong="H0305"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* were \w directed|strong="H3559"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*!
Then shall I not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, when I have \w respect|strong="H5027"\w* unto all thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee with \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, when I shall have \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* thy \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 119.7 \ft thy…: Heb. judgments of thy righteousness\f*
I will \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*: O \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me not \w utterly|strong="H3966"\w*. \tl  ב BETH.\tl*

Wherewithal shall a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w cleanse|strong="H2135"\w* his \w way|strong="H0734"\w*? by taking \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* \add thereto\add* according to thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.
With my whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* have I \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* thee: O let me not \w wander|strong="H7686"\w* from thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.
Thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w* have I \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* in mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, that I might not \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against thee.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add art\add* thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.
With my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* have I \w declared|strong="H5608"\w* all the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
I have \w rejoiced|strong="H7797"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, as \add much as\add* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* all \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*.
I will \w meditate|strong="H7878"\w* in thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*, and have \w respect|strong="H5027"\w* unto thy \w ways|strong="H0734"\w*.
I will \w delight|strong="H8173"\w* myself in thy \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*: I will not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*. \tl  ג GIMEL.\tl*
Deal \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add that\add* I may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Open|strong="H1540"\w* thou mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, that I may \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* wondrous \w things|strong="H6381"\w* out of thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 119.18 \ft Open: Heb. Reveal\f*
I \add am\add* a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* not thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* from me.
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w breaketh|strong="H1638"\w* for the \w longing|strong="H8375"\w* \add that it hath\add* unto thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* at all \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.
Thou hast \w rebuked|strong="H1605"\w* the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* \add that are\add* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w*, which do \w err|strong="H7686"\w* from thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.
\w Remove|strong="H1556"\w* from me \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* and \w contempt|strong="H0937"\w*; for I have \w kept|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*.

\w Princes|strong="H8269"\w* also did \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \add and\add* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* against me: \add but\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* did \w meditate|strong="H7878"\w* in thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.

Thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w* also \add are\add* my \w delight|strong="H8191"\w* \add and\add* my \w counsellors|strong="H0582"\w*.\f + \fr 119.24 \ft my counsellors: Heb. men of my counsel\f* \tl  ד DALETH.\tl*
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: \w quicken|strong="H2421"\w* thou me according to thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.
I have \w declared|strong="H5608"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and thou \w heardest|strong="H6030"\w* me: \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.
Make me to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*: so shall I \w talk|strong="H7878"\w* of thy wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*.

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w melteth|strong="H1811"\w* for \w heaviness|strong="H8424"\w*: \w strengthen|strong="H6965"\w* thou me according unto thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 119.28 \ft melteth: Heb. droppeth\f*
\w Remove|strong="H5493"\w* from me the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w lying|strong="H8267"\w*: and grant me thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w graciously|strong="H2603"\w*.
I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*: thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* have I \w laid|strong="H7737"\w* \add before me\add*.
I have \w stuck|strong="H1692"\w* unto thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, put me not to \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.
I will \w run|strong="H7323"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, when thou shalt \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. \tl  ה HE.\tl*

\w Teach|strong="H3384"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*; and I shall \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* it \add unto\add* the \w end|strong="H6118"\w*.

Give me \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*, and I shall \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; yea, I shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* it with \add my\add* whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
Make me to \w go|strong="H1869"\w* in the \w path|strong="H5410"\w* of thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*; for therein do I \w delight|strong="H2654"\w*.
\w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* unto thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, and not to \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*.

Turn \w away|strong="H5674"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from \w beholding|strong="H7200"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*; \add and\add* \w quicken|strong="H2421"\w* thou me in thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 119.37 \ft Turn…: Heb. Make to pass\f*
\w Stablish|strong="H6965"\w* thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, who \add is devoted\add* to thy \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*.
Turn \w away|strong="H5674"\w* my \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* which I \w fear|strong="H3025"\w*: for thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.
Behold, I have \w longed|strong="H8373"\w* after thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*: \w quicken|strong="H2421"\w* me in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*. \tl  ו VAU.\tl*

Let thy \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* also unto me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* thy \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*, according to thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w*.

So shall I have \w wherewith|strong="H1697"\w* to \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* him that \w reproacheth|strong="H2778"\w* me: for I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 119.42 \ft So…: or, So shall I answer him that reproveth me in a thing\f*

And \w take|strong="H5337"\w* not the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w utterly|strong="H3966"\w* out of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; for I have \w hoped|strong="H3176"\w* in thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.
So shall I \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.
And I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* at \w liberty|strong="H7342"\w*: for I \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.\f + \fr 119.45 \ft at liberty: Heb. at large\f*
I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* of thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w* also before \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and will not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.
And I will \w delight|strong="H8173"\w* myself in thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*.

My \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* also will I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* unto thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*; and I will \w meditate|strong="H7878"\w* in thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*. \tl  ז ZAIN.\tl*
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, upon which thou hast caused me to \w hope|strong="H3176"\w*.
This \add is\add* my \w comfort|strong="H5165"\w* in my \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*: for thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w* hath \w quickened|strong="H2421"\w* me.
The \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* have had me \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* in \w derision|strong="H3887"\w*: \add yet\add* have I not \w declined|strong="H5186"\w* from thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.
I \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and have \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* myself.
\w Horror|strong="H2152"\w* hath taken \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* upon me because of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.
Thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* have been my \w songs|strong="H2158"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w pilgrimage|strong="H4033"\w*.

I have \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.
This I had, because I \w kept|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*. \tl  ח CHETH.\tl*
\add Thou art\add* my \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that I would \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

I \w intreated|strong="H2470"\w* thy \w favour|strong="H6440"\w* with \add my\add* whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me according to thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w*.\f + \fr 119.58 \ft favour: Heb. face\f*
I \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* on my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* unto thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*.
I made \w haste|strong="H2363"\w*, and \w delayed|strong="H4102"\w* not to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

The \w bands|strong="H2256"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* have \w robbed|strong="H5749"\w* me: \add but\add* I have not \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 119.61 \ft bands: or, companies\f*
At \w midnight|strong="H2676"\w* I will \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thee because of thy \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.
I \add am\add* a \w companion|strong="H2270"\w* of all \add them\add* that \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee, and of them that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*: \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*. \tl  ט TETH.\tl*
Thou hast \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according unto thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Teach|strong="H3925"\w* me \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w judgment|strong="H2940"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: for I have \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.
Before I was \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* I went \w astray|strong="H7683"\w*: but now have I \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w*.
Thou \add art\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and doest \w good|strong="H2895"\w*; \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* me thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.

The \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* have \w forged|strong="H2950"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* against me: \add but\add* I will \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w* with \add my\add* whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
Their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is as \w fat|strong="H2954"\w* as \w grease|strong="H2459"\w*; \add but\add* I \w delight|strong="H8173"\w* in thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.
\add It is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for me that I have been \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*; that I might \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.

The \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* unto me than \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \tl  י JOD.\tl*

Thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* me and \w fashioned|strong="H3559"\w* me: give me \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*, that I may \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.
They that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* thee will be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* when they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* me; because I have \w hoped|strong="H3176"\w* in thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* \w right|strong="H6664"\w*, and \add that\add* thou in \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* hast \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* me.\f + \fr 119.75 \ft right: Heb. righteousness\f*

Let, I pray thee, thy merciful \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* be for my \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w*, according to thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 119.76 \ft for…: Heb. to comfort me\f*
Let thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me, that I may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: for thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add is\add* my \w delight|strong="H8191"\w*.

Let the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*; for they dealt \w perversely|strong="H5791"\w* with me without a \w cause|strong="H8267"\w*: \add but\add* I will \w meditate|strong="H7878"\w* in thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.
Let those that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* thee \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, and those that have \w known|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*.
Let my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* be \w sound|strong="H8549"\w* in thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*; that I be not \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*. \tl  כ CAPH.\tl*
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w fainteth|strong="H3615"\w* for thy \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*: \add but\add* I \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.
Mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* for thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When wilt thou \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* me?
For I am become like a \w bottle|strong="H4997"\w* in the \w smoke|strong="H7008"\w*; \add yet\add* do I not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.

How many \add are\add* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? when wilt thou \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* on them that \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me?
The \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* have \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* \w pits|strong="H7882"\w* for me, which \add are\add* not after thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

All thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \add are\add* \w faithful|strong="H0530"\w*: they \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me \w wrongfully|strong="H8267"\w*; \w help|strong="H5826"\w* thou me.\f + \fr 119.86 \ft faithful: Heb. faithfulness\f*
They had \w almost|strong="H4592"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* me upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; but I \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* not thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.

\w Quicken|strong="H2421"\w* me after thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*; so shall I \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*. \tl  ל LAMED.\tl*
For \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* is \w settled|strong="H5324"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

Thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* \add is\add* unto \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: thou hast \w established|strong="H3559"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and it \w abideth|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 119.90 \ft unto…: Heb. to generation and generation\f*\f + \fr 119.90 \ft abideth: Heb. standeth\f*
They \w continue|strong="H5975"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* according to thine \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*: for all \add are\add* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.
\w Unless|strong="H3884"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add had been\add* my \w delights|strong="H8191"\w*, I should then have \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* in mine \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*.
I will \w never|strong="H5769"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*: for with them thou hast \w quickened|strong="H2421"\w* me.
I \add am\add* thine, \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me; for I have \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.
The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* have \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* for me to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* me: \add but\add* I will \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* thy \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*.

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* an \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of all \w perfection|strong="H8502"\w*: \add but\add* thy \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \add is\add* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w broad|strong="H7342"\w*. \tl  מ MEM.\tl*
O how love \w I|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*! it \add is\add* my \w meditation|strong="H7881"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Thou through thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* hast made me \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w* than mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: for they \add are\add* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* with me.\f + \fr 119.98 \ft they…: Heb. it is ever with me\f*
I have more \w understanding|strong="H7919"\w* than all my \w teachers|strong="H3925"\w*: for thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w* \add are\add* my \w meditation|strong="H7881"\w*.
I \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* more than the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w*, because I \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w*.
I have \w refrained|strong="H3607"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* from every \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H0734"\w*, that I might \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.
I have not \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: for thou hast \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* me.

How \w sweet|strong="H4452"\w* are thy \w words|strong="H0565"\w* unto my \w taste|strong="H2441"\w*! \add yea, sweeter\add* than \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* to my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*!\f + \fr 119.103 \ft taste: Heb. palate\f*
Through thy \w precepts|strong="H6490"\w* I get \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*: therefore I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* every \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w way|strong="H0734"\w*. \tl  נ NUN.\tl*

Thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* a \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* unto my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and a \w light|strong="H0216"\w* unto my \w path|strong="H5410"\w*.\f + \fr 119.105 \ft lamp: or, candle\f*
